scripts.build:css:minify:
esbuild ../backend/webcore/static/webcore/css/styles.css --outdir=../backend/webcore/static/webcore/css --out-extension:.css=.min.css --sourcemap --minify --legal-comments=none --banner:css='/*
 * jew.pizza compiled CSS
 *
 * For more info go to https://github.com/dtcooper/jewpizza
 */'
scripts.build:js:
esbuild src/index.js src/placeholder.js --outdir=../backend/webcore/static/webcore/js --bundle --sourcemap --minify --out-extension:.js=.min.js --legal-comments=none --banner:js='/*
 * jew.pizza compiled JavaScript
 *
 * For more info go to https://github.com/dtcooper/jewpizza
 */'
